official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act to provide criminal sanctions for an act of sabotage of a nuclear power plant during its construction which could affect the public health and safety were it to go undetected.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to apply certain criminal penalty provisions to persons who willfully destroy or damage a nuclear facility during its construction where the action could affect public health and safety if undetected before operation.
